thread.title: RUMOURS: Liverpool to push through Promes deal
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Liverpool to push through Promes deal

title: RUMOURS: Liverpool to push through Promes deal
text:
0 8 Jan 2017 17:47:40 The 25-year-old is seen as a natural replacement for Sadio Mane, who is away on international duty, and could prove the difference in the Reds' title challenge 
Liverpool are ready to thrash out a deal for Spartak Moscow attacker Quincy Promes, but will have to pay up to Â£25 million for his services, according to the Mirror. 
Jurgen Klopp is on the search for additional firepower this month as Sadio Mane represents Senegal in the African Cup of Nations. 
Promes is seen by the Reds boss as a natural replacement for Mane, who has been responsible for nine goals and four assists in the Premier League this season, and could prove the distance in the club's title charge. 
Liverpool have been monitoring the 25-year-old Netherlands international for some time and will make a move in the coming weeks as interest in the winger hots up.
